mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les plees del corone, diuisees in plusors titles & common lieux: per queux home pluis redement & plenairement trouera quelq[ue] chose que il quira, touchant les dits plees / composes per le tresreuerend iudge, monsieur Guilliaulme Staunforde chiualer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rastell, William, 1508?-1565
Staunford, William Sir, 1509-1558
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Ex typographia Societatis Stationariorum [by Adam Islip
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dernierment corrigee, auecques vn table parfaicte des choses notables contenus en ycelle, nouelment reueu & corrigee, oue ascun nouel additions.
"Cest table ne fuit collect ne fait per monsieur Stanford, mes per vn auter. Viz. William Rastell ..."--verso of 12th prelim. leaf.
LAW: Bound with: Staunford, William, Sir. An exposition of the king's prerogatiue ... London : Printed for the Company of Stationers, 1607.
LAW: Bound with: Staunford, William, Sir. An exposition of the king's prerogatiue ... London : Printed for the Company of Stationers, 1607.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pleas of the crown
Capital punishment--Great Britain.
